name: WordPress
short_description: Popular open-source content management system for websites and blogs.
description: Popular open-source content management system for websites and blogs. WordPress is a self-hosted application focused on cms, blog, self-hosted, homelab. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host WordPress on your home server to popular open-source content management system for websites and blogs without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use WordPress to manage your cms workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
